document_data.name: Velicia
document_data.mainbody:
'''Velicia''' was an [[archer]] [[gloom stalker]] member of [[The Guild]] crime gang of [[Baldur's Gate]] and secretly an undercover [[Harper]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Observing... spying... disguised...|Archer Velicia}}
document_data.Description: Velicia was a [[high elven]] woman with a fair skin tone and straight red hair gathered in a tight ponytail. She wore a [[half plate]] dyed in green colors of the Guild.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Velicia was placed as an undercover spy to work under [[Farlin]], who led a gang of Guild members in dealing with the [[Stone Lord]] and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the [[Absolute]] and was trying to remove the Guild's influence from across the Gate. Farlin's group faced a band of the Stone Lord's men led by the [[tiefling]] [[Cairos]], under the [[Wyrm's Crossing]] bridge in [[Rivington]]. However, the meeting devolved into a battle and his squad's fate remained uncertain, whether they were killed by the gangsters or survived and returned safely to the Guild's safehouse.
